Writer: Richard Maibaum (screenplay), John Hopkins (screenplay), Jack Whittingham (original screenplay), Kevin McClory (original story), Jack Whittingham (original story), Ian Fleming (original story)
Title: Thunderball
Actors: Sean Connery, Claudine Auger, Adolfo Celi, Luciana Paluzzi
Plot: James Bond heads to The Bahamas to recover two nuclear warheads stolen by SPECTRE agent Emilio Largo in an international extortion scheme.
